definition: an involuntary vibration (as if from illness or fear), shake, as from cold
details:
noun
- an involuntary vibration (as if from illness or fear)
= synonyms: tremor
- an almost pleasurable sensation of fright
= synonyms: quiver, shiver, thrill, chill, tingle, frisson
verb
- shake, as from cold
= synonyms: shiver
- tremble convulsively, as from fear or excitement
= synonyms: shiver, thrill, throb
